etymology.description: Depicts a rightward curved line representing a private or concealed space
etymology.interpretation: The character 厶(厶) (sī, "private") represents a shape that suggests seclusion or enclosure, symbolizing privacy or secrecy.

examples.chinese: 每个人都有自己的厶隐空间(每個人都有自己的厶隱空間)。
examples.pinyin: Měi gèrén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de sī yǐn kōngjiān.
examples.english: Everyone has their own private space.

examples.chinese: 请勿侵犯他人的厶权(請勿侵犯他人的厶權)，维护大家的尊严(維護大家的尊嚴)。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng wù qīn fàn tā rén de sī quán, wéihù dàjiā de zūnyán.
examples.english: Do not infringe on others' private rights, and uphold everyone's dignity.

examples.chinese: 处理公与厶时(處理公與厶時)，他总能分清界限(他總能分清界限)。
examples.pinyin: Chǔlǐ gōng yǔ sī shí, tā zǒng néng fēn qīng jièxiàn.
examples.english: When dealing with public and private matters, he always distinguishes the boundaries clearly.
